scripts.winpack: electron-packager . --platform=win32 --out ./release-builds --arch=x64 --overwrite --asar --icon=./assets/icons/windows/icon.ico --win32metadata.CompanyName="Genotify" --win32metadata.ProductName="Genotify" --win32metadata.FileDescription="Genotify" --appCopyright="Copyright © 2018 Jared Andrews. All rights reserved."
scripts.osxpack: electron-packager . --platform=darwin --out ./release-builds --arch=x64 --overwrite --asar --icon=./assets/icons/mac/1024x1024.icns --appCopyright="Copyright © 2018 Jared Andrews. All rights reserved."
scripts.linpack: electron-packager . --platform=linux --out ./release-builds --arch=x64 --overwrite --asar --icon=./assets/icons/png/1024x1024.png --appCopyright="Copyright © 2018 Jared Andrews. All rights reserved."
